name: MANVEER SINGH
college: Guru Tegh Bahadur Institute of Technology

education.school: Guru Tegh Bahadur Institute of Technology

projects.name: FULL STACK ECOMMERCE PLATFORM
projects.description: The project aims to focus on the functionality of an ecommerce platform. Redux has been used for the state management in the frontend and Nodejs for the Backend Apis. Stripe has been used as the payment model.

projects.name: POKEDEX APP
projects.description: Made this basic Pokedex App using React to brush up my concepts for the APIs, Pagination etc.

projects.name: REST APIS: Authentication and Authorization
projects.description: Created a Backend project using node, express and mongoose which helps the users to signup, sign in,logout, and many other functionalities. Users can also reset their password if they forget password in any case. Concept of JSON WEB TOKEN has also been used.

projects.name: Blogging Website
projects.description: Made a Backend project using node, express and mongoose of a blogging website, which features to create a blog, create a comment on a blog, deleting the comment, liking, and disliking a blog. From basic routers to controllers and mongoose models everything is handled.

projects.name: Proficiency in Data Structures and Algorithms

experiences.description: Developed API functionalities for the AkoSayara project, focusing on both frontend and backend aspects. Implemented frontend button functionalities to enhance user experience. Created backend APIs for sending messages and managing user details, contributing to project functionality and efficiency. Currently spearheading API development for the Dictation App project, leveraging expertise in backend systems. Designing and implementing APIs to facilitate dictation functionality, ensuring seamless integration with frontend components. Collaborating with cross-functional teams to meet project milestones and deliver high-quality solutions.

full_output.name: MANVEER SINGH
